subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets offensive lineman Willie Colon left the Melrose Houses in 2001 for Hofstra University and then his N.F.L. career, but he returns often to see relatives and longtime friends.
snippet: Jets offensive lineman Willie Colon left the Melrose Houses in 2001 for Hofstra University and then his N.F.L. career, but he returns often to see relatives and longtime friends.
